title: Watchers: The Coming of the King
description: THE WATCHERS TRILOGYBook 1: The Coming of the KingBook 2: The Battle for the ThroneBook 3: Culloden!It is 1745, and the long awaited night has come. The BloodKing calls his army to battle and will bring them South to claim his birthright; the throne of Britain.Only the Watchers on the old wall stand in his way, and the young officers of the Watch have a duty to perform.Stop the BloodKing.Or die trying Aims for pure entertainment ... and hits the markSimon Morden, VECTOR
author: William Meikle
